biz.paluch.spinach

Class DisqueClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lambdaworks.redis.AbstractRedisClient
      • biz.paluch.spinach.DisqueClient

  • public class DisqueClient
extends com.lambdaworks.redis.AbstractRedisClient
    A scalable thread-safe Disque client. Multiple threads may share one connection if they avoid blocking operations. DisqueClient is an expensive resource. It holds a set of netty's EventLoopGroup's that consist of up to Number of CPU's * 4 threads. Reuse this instance as much as possible.
    Author:
    Mark Paluch

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisqueClient

        protected DisqueClient(com.lambdaworks.redis.resource.ClientResources clientResources,

      • DisqueClient

        @Deprecated
public DisqueClient()
        Deprecated. Use the factory method create()
        Creates a uri-less DisqueClient. You can connect to different Disque servers but you must supply a DisqueURI on connecting. Methods without having a DisqueURI will fail with a IllegalStateException.

      • DisqueClient

        @Deprecated
public DisqueClient(String uri)
        Deprecated. Use the factory method create(String)
        Create a new client that connects to the supplied host on the default port.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Disque URI.

      • DisqueClient

        @Deprecated
public DisqueClient(String host,
                                int port)
        Deprecated. Use the factory method create(DisqueURI)
        Create a new client that connects to the supplied host and port. Connection attempts and non-blocking commands will timeout after 60 seconds.
        Parameters:
        host - Server hostname.
        port - Server port.

      • DisqueClient

        @Deprecated
public DisqueClient(DisqueURI disqueURI)
        Deprecated. Use the factory method create(DisqueURI)
        Create a new client that connects to the supplied host and port. Connection attempts and non-blocking commands will timeout after 60 seconds.
        Parameters:
        disqueURI - Disque URI.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static DisqueClient create()
        Creates a uri-less DisqueClient with default ClientResources. You can connect to different Redis servers but you must supply a RedisURI on connecting. Methods without having a RedisURI will fail with a IllegalStateException.
        Returns:
        a new instance of DisqueClient

      • create

        public static DisqueClient create(DisqueURI disqueURI)
        Create a new client that connects to the supplied uri with default ClientResources. You can connect to different Redis servers but you must supply a RedisURI on connecting.
        Parameters:
        disqueURI - the Redis URI, must not be null
        Returns:
        a new instance of DisqueClient

      • create

        public static DisqueClient create(String uri)
        Create a new client that connects to the supplied uri with default ClientResources. You can connect to different Redis servers but you must supply a RedisURI on connecting.
        Parameters:
        uri - the Redis URI, must not be null
        Returns:
        a new instance of DisqueClient

      • create

        public static DisqueClient create(com.lambdaworks.redis.resource.ClientResources clientResources)
        Creates a uri-less DisqueClient with shared ClientResources. You need to shut down the ClientResources upon shutting down your application. You can connect to different Redis servers but you must supply a RedisURI on connecting. Methods without having a RedisURI will fail with a IllegalStateException.
        Parameters:
        clientResources - the client resources, must not be null
        Returns:
        a new instance of DisqueClient

      • create

        public static DisqueClient create(com.lambdaworks.redis.resource.ClientResources clientResources,
                                  String uri)
        Create a new client that connects to the supplied uri with shared ClientResources.You need to shut down the ClientResources upon shutting down your application. You can connect to different Redis servers but you must supply a RedisURI on connecting.
        Parameters:
        clientResources - the client resources, must not be null
        uri - the Redis URI, must not be null
        Returns:
        a new instance of DisqueClient

      • connect

        public DisqueConnection<String,String> connect()
        Open a new connection to a Disque server that treats keys and values as UTF-8 strings. This method requires to have the DisqueURI specified when constructing the client.
        Returns:
        A new connection.

      • connect

        public <K,V> DisqueConnection<K,V> connect(com.lambdaworks.redis.codec.RedisCodec<K,V> codec)
        Open a new connection to a Disque server. Use the supplied codec to encode/decode keys and values.
        Type Parameters:
        K - Key type.
        V - Value type.
        Parameters:
        codec - use this codec to encode/decode keys and values, must note be null
        Returns:
        A new connection.

      • connect

        public DisqueConnection<String,String> connect(DisqueURI disqueURI)
        Open a new connection to a Disque server with the supplied DisqueURI that treats keys and values as UTF-8 strings.
        Parameters:
        disqueURI - the disque server to connect to, must not be null
        Returns:
        A new connection.

      • connect

        public <K,V> DisqueConnection<K,V> connect(com.lambdaworks.redis.codec.RedisCodec<K,V> codec,
                                           DisqueURI disqueURI,
                                           SocketAddressSupplierFactory socketAddressSupplierFactory)
        Open a new connection to a Disque server using the supplied DisqueURI and the supplied codec to encode/decode keys.
        Type Parameters:
        K - Key type.
        V - Value type.
        Parameters:
        codec - use this codec to encode/decode keys and values, must not be null
        disqueURI - the Disque server to connect to, must not be null
        socketAddressSupplierFactory - factory for SocketAddress for connecting to Disque based on multiple connection points.
        Returns:
        A new connection.

        the ClientResources for this client
